chatbot.notUnderstood: Sorry, I didn’t understand your question.
chatbot.suspicious: ⚠️ Your messages look suspicious, so I can’t continue this conversation right now.

intros: Good point — let’s go over it 👇
No problem, here’s how it works:
Happy to clarify this for you 🙂
outros: Would you like me to give you more details?
Would you like me to show you how it works in practice?
This is one of our most popular features 🚀
Would you like me to walk you through an example?
Many restaurant owners love using this feature 🙌
Would you like me to break it down step by step?
Can I share a tip on how to get the most out of it?
pricingOutro: And remember, our plans are designed to grow with your restaurant 💡
Plus, our pricing is flexible, so you only pay for what you really need 💸
The nice part is you can start simple and add features as you grow 🚀
And don’t forget: yearly plans come with extra savings 😉
supportOutro: And don't worry, our team usually responds in less than 24 hours ⏱️
If you ever need us, we’re just an email away 📧
Our support is friendly, fast, and always happy to help 🙌
Most questions get answered the same day, often within a few hours ⚡

greeting: Hello 👋! How can I help you today?
Welcome 🙌 Would you like to know more about Myrestaurantmenu?
Hi there! 😊 Are you looking for features or pricing info?
Hey! 👋 Curious about how Myrestaurantmenu can help your restaurant?
Good to see you! 🍽️ What would you like to explore first?
thanks: My pleasure — do you have any more questions?
Happy I could help — is there something else you’d like to know?
Always here if you need me! 👌
goodbye: Goodbye, have a great day at your restaurant 🚀
Bye for now — wishing you lots of happy customers 🌟
support: No worries, I can connect you with our team. Could you share your contact details, please?
I'd love to help. Can you leave your email or phone so we can reach out?
If you’d prefer, I can pass this directly to our support team 📩 — can you share your contact?
Our team can follow up quickly if you give us your email or number 👌
